title: Dantley Davis (Twitter head of Research/Design, car enthusiast)
description:
Dantley Davis is the head of research and design at Twitter, a frequent track driver, and a car collector. We have a fascinating conversation about social media's impact on the world, the responsibility of software companies, and where it's headed. And we talk about cars, of course.

Follow us! T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman @dantley

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman

Watch the show: https://youtu.be/Sx1pZzQ1ouc
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (youtube, top gear, zach, zack, tests, twitter rules, technology, twitter influence, twitter censorship, vod cars, jalopnik, twitter bots, smoking tire, interview, podcast, klapman, reviews, startup, power, news, matt, news, noise, supercars, farrah, dinner, discussion, projects, hoonigan, racers, mercedes, drift, jack dorsey, farah, clapman, porsche, dantley davis, diesel, how to fight twitter bots, click clack, car cast, burnout, bmw, car talk, cars, burnouts, autonomous, comparisons, Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
